message: A 270 slide presentation by the **AWESOME** Addy Osmani about front-end workflow
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: Any one use Grunt, Bower, Yeoman ... these wizardy stuff?
Awesome :), let me guess ... OS not windows :D
FOR SUREEEE :D but i also use Linux ... and i tried Grunt once on windows and it work from the nodejs command prompt.

I was able to run Yeoman earlier versions on Windows after a lot of pain by installing all dependencies separately and installing it from npm ... Working with package management isn't something easy when you are on Windows :( I have an old laptop I am planning to start using Ubuntu for a while to see if it will improve my workflow :)

Linux will enhance your workflow for sure... you can install ubuntu side by side with your current windows.  i have the latest Ubuntu installed beside Windows on my Personal laptop and for my work i have a Mac Mini.
